nodes.title: Add this year's April Fools comic to interactive_comics
Offline optimization: skip preexisting files when downloading.
Alt text fix: escape HTML, fixes #176
Use a stable version of material
Add FastScrollPopup to compact cards overview
Color navigation bar based on day/night theme
Move "Update on mobile data" to better location
Use switches instead of checkboxes in preferences
Show random FAB tip in snackbar
Use GitHub Action to build app
Make Widget Alt Text More Readable
Use FileOutputStreams when building offline cache
Fixes #134 : app crash when removed from Favorites
Add menu option to mark all comics as read
make what if questions and links more readable in night mode
Added comic 1509 to the list of large comics
Added comic 930 to the list of large comics
Added drawer close if open on back press
Changed pager margin to padding for edge-to-edge zoom
Add feature - Export Favorites list as text
Improved back button behaviour and fixed #46
Added comic 832 to the list of large comics
Added comic 1461 to the list of large comics
Added new Options to the options menu in the FavoritesFragment and the OfflineFragment
Added "Open in browser" option to the comic browser
